name: Indescendance
description:
Indescendance is a donjon boss rush game.

Evil is lurking on our world and only your bloodline can save it due to their capabiliy to transfer their knowledges and strengths to their heir.

You have 10 centuries to defeat the root of evil protected by his minions.

If you die, you will play as your heir but worry not, he will keep everything you learned!

Don't take the situation lightly though, one death cost you one century.

Use the roots of your bloodline to defeat the root of evil ! 

currently gamejam prototype

______________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Movement : ZQSD

Attack : LMB

Parry / Shield : RMB

Heal : X

L-SHIFT / SPACE BAR : Avoid
